page.title: 02CLARENS GUEST HOUSE,VENTNOR.
page.content: Clarens Guest House was taken over by Mrs. and Mrs. T. Brown in December 1984. Situated in Alpine Road it has panoramic views from every bedroom. It caters for 18 guests mainly from Yorkshire and Lancashire and Southern England. Like most family-run guest houses in the town the tariffs are modest but the atmosphere is homely and friendly. Mrs. Brown employs one person to help with the cleaning. Fire precautions have been installed recently. Only one bedroom has a private shower and toilet but there are two other bathrooms. There is a coloured T.V. in the lounge and jig-saw games and books are available for wet days. One new facility this year is champagne honeymoon breakfasts. In 1986 Mrs. Brown intends to cater for school parties.
